actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 9, 1977, and ending October 15, 1977, as National Gifted Children Week.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning October 9, 1977, and ending October 15, 1977, as "National Gifted Children Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 9, 1977, and ending October 15, 1977, as National Gifted Children Week.
